summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for shipping services. It details charges for a shipment made on March 11, 2004, including transportation and handling fees, and provides a summary of the payment due.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated March 15, 2004, for shipping services provided to Jeffrey Epstein.
The total amount due on the invoice is $30.99.
The shipment was picked up on March 11, 2004, and delivered to Eric Gamy and Jejune Brennan.
The invoice includes a fuel surcharge and discounts applied to the total charges.
There are multiple references to FedEx's policies regarding invoice adjustments.
